name: Mirror fruit
description:
Game objectivesThe main playing method of "mirror fruit" is fruit Xiaole. Exchange different fruits so that any fruit can be eliminated by connecting more than 3. Players need to eliminate the specified fruit within the specified steps to pass. In order to enrich the game, various props are specially set up.
Every time you pass a specific level, you can unlock all kinds of CG, including all kinds of beautiful girls. Come and unlock them!
